Food_pebbles.name: RR Food Pebbles
Food_pebbles.description: Pebbles of food that Road Runner will certainly stop to eat so you can drop something on him.

coyote_cracklings.name: Coyote Cracklings
coyote_cracklings.description: Road Runner will certainly stop to dine on these crispy coyote cracklings, so that you can drop something on him.

bowl-soup.name: Bowl of Soup
bowl-soup.description: When Road Runner is feeling under the weather, he'll certainly stop running for this fortifying bowl of soup, so that you can drop something on him.

caution_tape.name: Caution Tape
caution_tape.description: An inexpensive roadblock for a coyote on a budget.

wood_sawhorse.name: Wooden Sawhorse
wood_sawhorse.description: A medium strength roadblock that is sturdier than the caution tape but still designed for a coyote budget.

brick_wall.name: Brick Wall
brick_wall.description: For the coyote that is not concerned about cost, this wall cannot be broken down by the Road Runner. It is gauranteed to stop him in his tracks.

small_potholes.name: Small Potholes
small_potholes.description: If you want a moving target, but at a slower speed, these potholes are perfect. They'll slow Road Runner so you can drop something on him with a little more challenge.

medium_holes.name: Medium Size Hole
medium_holes.description: This hole is perfect for the coyote on a budget who wants a hole big enough to swallow Road Runner if he doesn't stop but not big enough to bust the budget.

cliff.name: cliff
cliff.description: When smaller holes aren't slowing or stopping Road Runner and budget isn't a concern then we can dig you a cliff. If he doesn't stop then he'll fall to his doom and you won't have to drop something on him.

small_anvil.name: Small Anvil
small_anvil.description: Perfect dropping item for the coyote on a budget. This won't knock Road Runner out, but should slow him down with a good braining.

medium_anvil.name: Medium Anvil
medium_anvil.description: Solid item to drop on Road Runner without totally breaking the budget. A well aimed hit will bash RR into the dirt.

large_anvil.name: Large Anvil
large_anvil.description: Perfect dropping item for the coyote with imperfect aim. This very large object should smash Road Runner and the immediate area around him into the ground.

upright_piano.name: Upright Piano
upright_piano.description: An solution to smash Road Runner with musical style.

grand_piano.name: Grand Piano
grand_piano.description: Perfect tool to drop on Road Runner to show total cartoon style and ettiquette.

player_piano.name: Player Piano
player_piano.description: Dropping a player piano on Road Runner shows both cartoon style ettiquette but also artistry as once he is smashed into the ground you can have the piano play his death march.

small_boulder_bunch.name: Small Bunch of Boulders
small_boulder_bunch.description: For the coyote on a budget, this bunch of boulders can help you brain coyote without breaking the bank.

medium_boulder.name: Medium Boulder
medium_boulder.description: A solid and traditional fall back, the medium size boulder is a budget conscious way to smash Road Runner with out worrying about flair.

large_boulder.name: Large Boulder
large_boulder.description: For the older coyote who cannot aim quite as well or to just make sure to cover a large area to get the job done, a large boulder will smash both Road Runner and a large area around him  to bits - offering coyote more flexibility in aim.
